sections.purpose: To house experimental animals under controlled environmental conditions.
sections.scope: Applicable to animal husbandry in pharmacology research.
procedure: Clean and disinfect the cage thoroughly before introducing animals.
Provide appropriate bedding, food, and water.
Maintain temperature, humidity, and light cycle as per regulatory standards.
Observe animals at least twice daily for health status.
Remove sick animals immediately for veterinary care.
Record daily observations in the animal log.
precautions: Wear appropriate PPE when handling animals.
Avoid mixing animals of different groups or sexes unless required.
Ensure adequate space per animal as per regulations.
